moves.1. e4: Now this was a game I knew I would win as I had played my opponent before.
moves.1... e5 2. Bc4 Nf6 3. Nc3: He had a good start but not good enough.
moves.3... Nxe4: This left him with no choice.
moves.4. Nxe4 d5: I played the trick up my sleeve. Cheesy expression but still I was pleased with this move as I had never put anyone in this position before.
moves.5... c6 6. Bxc6+ Nxc6: Now once again we were equal.
moves.7. Nc3 Bc5 8. d3 Qf6: I was hoping he would fall for something like scholars mate.
